author: fielding
msg: Add APR_TRY_GCC_WARNING macro to dynamically test the iconv prototype

author: trawick
msg: This gets APR test programs linking on Tru64.  It may result in a
double -lm on some platforms, as we autodetect the need for -lm
but also hard-code the need for it in hints.m4.

author: trawick
msg: add iconv hints for AIX and Solaris (tested on AIX 4.3 and Solaris 8)
